00085 /* ******************* view3d space & buttons ************** */
00086 #define B_NOP               1
00087 #define B_REDR              2
00088 #define B_OBJECTPANELMEDIAN 1008
00089 
00090 /* temporary struct for storing transform properties */
00091 typedef struct {
00092     float ob_eul[4];   /* used for quat too... */
00093     float ob_scale[3]; /* need temp space due to linked values */
00094     float ob_dims[3];
00095     short link_scale;
00096     float ve_median[7];
00097     int curdef;
00098     float *defweightp;
00099 } TransformProperties;
00100 
00101 /* Helper function to compute a median changed value,
00102  * when the value should be clamped in [0.0, 1.0].
00103  * Returns either 0.0, 1.0 (both can be applied directly), a positive scale factor
00104  * for scale down, or a negative one for scale up.
00105  */
00106 static float compute_scale_factor(const float ve_median, const float median)
00107 {
00108     if (ve_median <= 0.0f)
00109         return 0.0f;
00110     else if (ve_median >= 1.0f)
00111         return 1.0f;
00112     else {
00113         /* Scale value to target median. */
00114         float median_new = ve_median;
00115         float median_orig = ve_median - median; /* Previous median value. */
00116 
00117         /* In case of floating point error. */
00118         CLAMP(median_orig, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00119         CLAMP(median_new, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00120 
00121         if (median_new <= median_orig) {
00122             /* Scale down. */
00123             return median_new / median_orig;
00124         }
00125         else {
00126             /* Scale up, negative to indicate it... */
00127             return -(1.0f - median_new) / (1.0f - median_orig);
00128         }
00129     }
00130 }
00131 
00132 /* is used for both read and write... */
00133 static void v3d_editvertex_buts(uiLayout *layout, View3D *v3d, Object *ob, float lim)
00134 {
00135     uiBlock *block = (layout) ? uiLayoutAbsoluteBlock(layout) : NULL;
00136     MDeformVert *dvert = NULL;
00137     TransformProperties *tfp;
00138     float median[7], ve_median[7];
00139     int tot, totw, totweight, totedge, totradius;
00140     char defstr[320];
00141     PointerRNA radius_ptr;
00142 
00143     median[0] = median[1] = median[2] = median[3] = median[4] = median[5] = median[6] = 0.0;
00144     tot = totw = totweight = totedge = totradius = 0;
00145     defstr[0] = 0;
00146 
00147     /* make sure we got storage */
00148     if (v3d->properties_storage == NULL)
00149         v3d->properties_storage = MEM_callocN(sizeof(TransformProperties), "TransformProperties");
00150     tfp = v3d->properties_storage;
00151 
00152     if (ob->type == OB_MESH) {
00153         Mesh *me = ob->data;
00154         BMEditMesh *em = me->edit_btmesh;
00155         BMesh *bm = em->bm;
00156         BMVert *eve, *evedef = NULL;
00157         BMEdge *eed;
00158         BMIter iter;
00159 
00160         BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00161             if (BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00162                 evedef = eve;
00163                 tot++;
00164                 add_v3_v3(median, eve->co);
00165             }
00166         }
00167 
00168         BM_ITER_MESH (eed, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00169             if (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00170                 float *f;
00171 
00172                 totedge++;
00173                 f = (float *)CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->edata, eed->head.data, CD_CREASE);
00174                 median[3] += f ? *f : 0.0f;
00175 
00176                 f = (float *)CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->edata, eed->head.data, CD_BWEIGHT);
00177                 median[6] += f ? *f : 0.0f;
00178             }
00179         }
00180 
00181         /* check for defgroups */
00182         if (evedef)
00183             dvert = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->vdata, evedef->head.data, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
00184         if (tot == 1 && dvert && dvert->totweight) {
00185             bDeformGroup *dg;
00186             int i, max = 1, init = 1;
00187             char str[320];
00188 
00189             for (i = 0; i < dvert->totweight; i++) {
00190                 dg = BLI_findlink(&ob->defbase, dvert->dw[i].def_nr);
00191                 if (dg) {
00192                     max += BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "%s %%x%d|", dg->name, dvert->dw[i].def_nr);
00193                     if (max < sizeof(str)) strcat(defstr, str);
00194                 }
00195 
00196                 if (tfp->curdef == dvert->dw[i].def_nr) {
00197                     init = 0;
00198                     tfp->defweightp = &dvert->dw[i].weight;
00199                 }
00200             }
00201 
00202             if (init) { /* needs new initialized */
00203                 tfp->curdef = dvert->dw[0].def_nr;
00204                 tfp->defweightp = &dvert->dw[0].weight;
00205             }
00206         }
00207     }
00208     else if (ob->type == OB_CURVE || ob->type == OB_SURF) {
00209         Curve *cu = ob->data;
00210         Nurb *nu;
00211         BPoint *bp;
00212         BezTriple *bezt;
00213         int a;
00214         ListBase *nurbs = curve_editnurbs(cu);
00215         StructRNA *seltype = NULL;
00216         void *selp = NULL;
00217 
00218         nu = nurbs->first;
00219         while (nu) {
00220             if (nu->type == CU_BEZIER) {
00221                 bezt = nu->bezt;
00222                 a = nu->pntsu;
00223                 while (a--) {
00224                     if (bezt->f2 & SELECT) {
00225                         add_v3_v3(median, bezt->vec[1]);
00226                         tot++;
00227                         median[4] += bezt->weight;
00228                         totweight++;
00229                         median[5] += bezt->radius;
00230                         totradius++;
00231                         selp = bezt;
00232                         seltype = &RNA_BezierSplinePoint;
00233                     }
00234                     else {
00235                         if (bezt->f1 & SELECT) {
00236                             add_v3_v3(median, bezt->vec[0]);
00237                             tot++;
00238                         }
00239                         if (bezt->f3 & SELECT) {
00240                             add_v3_v3(median, bezt->vec[2]);
00241                             tot++;
00242                         }
00243                     }
00244                     bezt++;
00245                 }
00246             }
00247             else {
00248                 bp = nu->bp;
00249                 a = nu->pntsu * nu->pntsv;
00250                 while (a--) {
00251                     if (bp->f1 & SELECT) {
00252                         add_v3_v3(median, bp->vec);
00253                         median[3] += bp->vec[3];
00254                         totw++;
00255                         tot++;
00256                         median[4] += bp->weight;
00257                         totweight++;
00258                         median[5] += bp->radius;
00259                         totradius++;
00260                         selp = bp;
00261                         seltype = &RNA_SplinePoint;
00262                     }
00263                     bp++;
00264                 }
00265             }
00266             nu = nu->next;
00267         }
00268 
00269         if (totradius == 1)
00270             RNA_pointer_create(&cu->id, seltype, selp, &radius_ptr);
00271     }
00272     else if (ob->type == OB_LATTICE) {
00273         Lattice *lt = ob->data;
00274         BPoint *bp;
00275         int a;
00276 
00277         a = lt->editlatt->latt->pntsu * lt->editlatt->latt->pntsv * lt->editlatt->latt->pntsw;
00278         bp = lt->editlatt->latt->def;
00279         while (a--) {
00280             if (bp->f1 & SELECT) {
00281                 add_v3_v3(median, bp->vec);
00282                 tot++;
00283                 median[4] += bp->weight;
00284                 totweight++;
00285             }
00286             bp++;
00287         }
00288     }
00289 
00290     if (tot == 0) {
00291         uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, IFACE_("Nothing selected"), 0, 130, 200, 20, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
00292         return;
00293     }
00294     median[0] /= (float)tot;
00295     median[1] /= (float)tot;
00296     median[2] /= (float)tot;
00297     if (totedge) {
00298         median[3] /= (float)totedge;
00299         median[6] /= (float)totedge;
00300     }
00301     else if (totw)
00302         median[3] /= (float)totw;
00303     if (totweight)
00304         median[4] /= (float)totweight;
00305     if (totradius)
00306         median[5] /= (float)totradius;
00307 
00308     if (v3d->flag & V3D_GLOBAL_STATS)
00309         mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, median);
00310 
00311     if (block) { /* buttons */
00312         uiBut *but;
00313         int yi = 200;
00314         const int buth = 20 * UI_DPI_ICON_FAC;
00315         const int but_margin = 2;
00316 
00317         memcpy(tfp->ve_median, median, sizeof(tfp->ve_median));
00318 
00319         uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
00320         if (tot == 1) {
00321             uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, IFACE_("Vertex:"), 0, yi -= buth, 200, buth, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
00322         }
00323         else {
00324             uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, IFACE_("Median:"), 0, yi -= buth, 200, buth, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
00325         }
00326 
00327         uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
00328 
00329         /* Should be no need to translate these. */
00330         but = uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_OBJECTPANELMEDIAN, "X:", 0, yi -= buth, 200, buth,
00331                         &(tfp->ve_median[0]), -lim, lim, 10, RNA_TRANSLATION_PREC_DEFAULT, "");
00332         uiButSetUnitType(but, PROP_UNIT_LENGTH);
00333         but = uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_OBJECTPANELMEDIAN, "Y:", 0, yi -= buth, 200, buth,
00334                         &(tfp->ve_median[1]), -lim, lim, 10, RNA_TRANSLATION_PREC_DEFAULT, "");
00335         uiButSetUnitType(but, PROP_UNIT_LENGTH);
00336         but = uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_OBJECTPANELMEDIAN, "Z:",0, yi -= buth, 200, buth,
00337                         &(tfp->ve_median[2]), -lim, lim, 10, RNA_TRANSLATION_PREC_DEFAULT, "");
00338         uiButSetUnitType(but, PROP_UNIT_LENGTH);
00339 
00340         if (totw == tot) {
00341             uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_OBJECTPANELMEDIAN, "W:", 0, yi -= buth, 200, buth,
00342                       &(tfp->ve_median[3]), 0.01, 100.0, 1, 3, "");
00343         }
00344 
00345         uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
00346         uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, V3D_GLOBAL_STATS, B_REDR, IFACE_("Global"),
00347                      0, yi -= buth + but_margin, 100, buth,
00348                      &v3d->flag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Displays global values");
00349         uiDefButBitS(block, TOGN, V3D_GLOBAL_STATS, B_REDR, IFACE_("Local"),
00350                      100, yi, 100, buth,
00351                      &v3d->flag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Displays local values");
00352         uiBlockEndAlign(block);
00353 
00354         if (totweight == 1) {
00355             uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_OBJECTPANELMEDIAN, IFACE_("Weight:"),
00356                       0, yi -= buth + but_margin, 200, buth,
00357                       &(tfp->ve_median[4]), 0.0, 1.0, 1, 3, TIP_("Weight used for SoftBody Goal"));
00358         }
00359         else if (totweight > 1) {
00360             uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_OBJECTPANELMEDIAN, IFACE_("Mean Weight:"),
00361                       0, yi -= buth, 200, buth,
00362                       &(tfp->ve_median[4]), 0.0, 1.0, 1, 3, TIP_("Weight used for SoftBody Goal"));
00363         }
00364 
00365         if (totradius == 1) {
00366             uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_OBJECTPANELMEDIAN, IFACE_("Radius:"),
00367                       0, yi -= buth + but_margin, 200, buth,
00368                       &(tfp->ve_median[5]), 0.0, 100.0, 1, 3, TIP_("Radius of curve control points"));
00369         }
00370         else if (totradius > 1) {
00371             uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_OBJECTPANELMEDIAN, IFACE_("Mean Radius:"),
00372                       0, yi -= buth + but_margin, 200, buth,
00373                       &(tfp->ve_median[5]), 0.0, 100.0, 1, 3, TIP_("Radius of curve control points"));
00374         }
00375 
00376         if (totedge == 1) {
00377             uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_OBJECTPANELMEDIAN, IFACE_("Crease:"),
00378                       0, yi -= buth + but_margin, 200, buth,
00379                       &(tfp->ve_median[3]), 0.0, 1.0, 1, 3, TIP_("Weight used by SubSurf modifier"));
00380             uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_OBJECTPANELMEDIAN, IFACE_("Bevel Weight:"),
00381                       0, yi -= buth + but_margin, 200, buth,
00382                       &(tfp->ve_median[6]), 0.0, 1.0, 1, 3, TIP_("Weight used by Bevel modifier"));
00383         }
00384         else if (totedge > 1) {
00385             uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_OBJECTPANELMEDIAN, IFACE_("Mean Crease:"),
00386                       0, yi -= buth + but_margin, 200, buth,
00387                       &(tfp->ve_median[3]), 0.0, 1.0, 1, 3, TIP_("Weight used by SubSurf modifier"));
00388             uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_OBJECTPANELMEDIAN, IFACE_("Mean Bevel Weight:"),
00389                       0, yi -= buth + but_margin, 200, buth,
00390                       &(tfp->ve_median[6]), 0.0, 1.0, 1, 3, TIP_("Weight used by Bevel modifier"));
00391         }
00392 
00393         uiBlockEndAlign(block);
00394         uiBlockEndAlign(block);
00395 
00396     }
00397     else { /* apply */
00398         memcpy(ve_median, tfp->ve_median, sizeof(tfp->ve_median));
00399 
00400         if (v3d->flag & V3D_GLOBAL_STATS) {
00401             invert_m4_m4(ob->imat, ob->obmat);
00402             mul_m4_v3(ob->imat, median);
00403             mul_m4_v3(ob->imat, ve_median);
00404         }
00405         sub_v3_v3v3(median, ve_median, median);
00406         median[3] = ve_median[3] - median[3];
00407         median[4] = ve_median[4] - median[4];
00408         median[5] = ve_median[5] - median[5];
00409         median[6] = ve_median[6] - median[6];
00410 
00411         if (ob->type == OB_MESH) {
00412             Mesh *me = ob->data;
00413             BMEditMesh *em = me->edit_btmesh;
00414             BMesh *bm = em->bm;
00415             BMVert *eve;
00416             BMIter iter;
00417 
00418             if (len_v3(median) > 0.000001f) {
00419 
00420                 BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00421                     if (BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00422                         add_v3_v3(eve->co, median);
00423                     }
00424                 }
00425 
00426                 EDBM_mesh_normals_update(em);
00427             }
00428 
00429             if (median[3] != 0.0f) {
00430                 BMEdge *eed;
00431                 const float sca = compute_scale_factor(ve_median[3], median[3]);
00432 
00433                 if (ELEM(sca, 0.0f, 1.0f)) {
00434                     BM_ITER_MESH (eed, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00435                         if (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00436                             float *crease = (float *)CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->edata, eed->head.data, CD_CREASE);
00437                             if (crease) {
00438                                 *crease = sca;
00439                             }
00440                         }
00441                     }
00442                 }
00443                 else if (sca > 0.0f) {
00444                     BM_ITER_MESH (eed, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00445                         if (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT) && !BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00446                             float *crease = (float *)CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->edata, eed->head.data, CD_CREASE);
00447                             if (crease) {
00448                                 *crease *= sca;
00449                                 CLAMP(*crease, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00450                             }
00451                         }
00452                     }
00453                 }
00454                 else {
00455                     BM_ITER_MESH (eed, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00456                         if (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT) && !BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00457                             float *crease = (float *)CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->edata, eed->head.data, CD_CREASE);
00458                             if (crease) {
00459                                 *crease = 1.0f + ((1.0f - *crease) * sca);
00460                                 CLAMP(*crease, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00461                             }
00462                         }
00463                     }
00464                 }
00465             }
00466 
00467             if (median[6] != 0.0f) {
00468                 BMEdge *eed;
00469                 const float sca = compute_scale_factor(ve_median[6], median[6]);
00470 
00471                 if (ELEM(sca, 0.0f, 1.0f)) {
00472                     BM_ITER_MESH (eed, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00473                         if (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00474                             float *bweight = (float *)CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->edata, eed->head.data, CD_BWEIGHT);
00475                             if (bweight) {
00476                                 *bweight = sca;
00477                             }
00478                         }
00479                     }
00480                 }
00481                 else if (sca > 0.0f) {
00482                     BM_ITER_MESH (eed, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00483                         if (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT) && !BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00484                             float *bweight = (float *)CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->edata, eed->head.data, CD_BWEIGHT);
00485                             if (bweight) {
00486                                 *bweight *= sca;
00487                                 CLAMP(*bweight, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00488                             }
00489                         }
00490                     }
00491                 }
00492                 else {
00493                     BM_ITER_MESH (eed, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00494                         if (BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT) && !BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00495                             float *bweight = (float *)CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->edata, eed->head.data, CD_BWEIGHT);
00496                             if (bweight) {
00497                                 *bweight = 1.0f + ((1.0f - *bweight) * sca);
00498                                 CLAMP(*bweight, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00499                             }
00500                         }
00501                     }
00502                 }
00503             }
00504             EDBM_mesh_normals_update(em);
00505         }
00506         else if (ELEM(ob->type, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF)) {
00507             Curve *cu = ob->data;
00508             Nurb *nu;
00509             BPoint *bp;
00510             BezTriple *bezt;
00511             int a;
00512             ListBase *nurbs = curve_editnurbs(cu);
00513             const float scale_w = compute_scale_factor(ve_median[4], median[4]);
00514 
00515             nu = nurbs->first;
00516             while (nu) {
00517                 if (nu->type == CU_BEZIER) {
00518                     bezt = nu->bezt;
00519                     a = nu->pntsu;
00520                     while (a--) {
00521                         if (bezt->f2 & SELECT) {
00522                             add_v3_v3(bezt->vec[0], median);
00523                             add_v3_v3(bezt->vec[1], median);
00524                             add_v3_v3(bezt->vec[2], median);
00525 
00526                             if (median[4] != 0.0f) {
00527                                 if (ELEM(scale_w, 0.0f, 1.0f)) {
00528                                     bezt->weight = scale_w;
00529                                 }
00530                                 else {
00531                                     bezt->weight = scale_w > 0.0f ? bezt->weight * scale_w :
00532                                                                     1.0f + ((1.0f - bezt->weight) * scale_w);
00533                                     CLAMP(bezt->weight, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00534                                 }
00535                             }
00536 
00537                             bezt->radius += median[5];
00538                         }
00539                         else {
00540                             if (bezt->f1 & SELECT) {
00541                                 add_v3_v3(bezt->vec[0], median);
00542                             }
00543                             if (bezt->f3 & SELECT) {
00544                                 add_v3_v3(bezt->vec[2], median);
00545                             }
00546                         }
00547                         bezt++;
00548                     }
00549                 }
00550                 else {
00551                     bp = nu->bp;
00552                     a = nu->pntsu * nu->pntsv;
00553                     while (a--) {
00554                         if (bp->f1 & SELECT) {
00555                             add_v3_v3(bp->vec, median);
00556                             bp->vec[3] += median[3];
00557 
00558                             if (median[4] != 0.0f) {
00559                                 if (ELEM(scale_w, 0.0f, 1.0f)) {
00560                                     bp->weight = scale_w;
00561                                 }
00562                                 else {
00563                                     bp->weight = scale_w > 0.0f ? bp->weight * scale_w :
00564                                                                   1.0f + ((1.0f - bp->weight) * scale_w);
00565                                     CLAMP(bp->weight, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00566                                 }
00567                             }
00568 
00569                             bp->radius += median[5];
00570                         }
00571                         bp++;
00572                     }
00573                 }
00574                 test2DNurb(nu);
00575                 testhandlesNurb(nu); /* test for bezier too */
00576 
00577                 nu = nu->next;
00578             }
00579         }
00580         else if (ob->type == OB_LATTICE) {
00581             Lattice *lt = ob->data;
00582             BPoint *bp;
00583             int a;
00584             const float scale_w = compute_scale_factor(ve_median[4], median[4]);
00585 
00586             a = lt->editlatt->latt->pntsu * lt->editlatt->latt->pntsv * lt->editlatt->latt->pntsw;
00587             bp = lt->editlatt->latt->def;
00588             while (a--) {
00589                 if (bp->f1 & SELECT) {
00590                     add_v3_v3(bp->vec, median);
00591 
00592                     if (median[4] != 0.0f) {
00593                         if (ELEM(scale_w, 0.0f, 1.0f)) {
00594                             bp->weight = scale_w;
00595                         }
00596                         else {
00597                             bp->weight = scale_w > 0.0f ? bp->weight * scale_w :
00598                                                           1.0f + ((1.0f - bp->weight) * scale_w);
00599                             CLAMP(bp->weight, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00600                         }
00601                     }
00602                 }
00603                 bp++;
00604             }
00605         }
00606 
00607 /*      ED_undo_push(C, "Transform properties"); */
00608     }
00609 }
00610 #define B_VGRP_PNL_COPY 1
00611 #define B_VGRP_PNL_NORMALIZE 2
00612 #define B_VGRP_PNL_EDIT_SINGLE 8 /* or greater */
00613 #define B_VGRP_PNL_COPY_SINGLE 16384 /* or greater */
00614 
00615 static void act_vert_def(Object *ob, BMVert **eve, MDeformVert **dvert)
00616 {
00617     if (ob && ob->mode & OB_MODE_EDIT && ob->type == OB_MESH && ob->defbase.first) {
00618         Mesh *me = ob->data;
00619         BMEditMesh *em = me->edit_btmesh;
00620         BMEditSelection *ese = (BMEditSelection *)em->bm->selected.last;
00621 
00622         if (ese && ese->htype == BM_VERT) {
00623             *eve = (BMVert *)ese->ele;
00624             *dvert = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->vdata, (*eve)->head.data, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
00625             return;
00626         }
00627     }
00628 
00629     *eve = NULL;
00630     *dvert = NULL;
00631 }
00632 
00633 static void editvert_mirror_update(Object *ob, BMVert *eve, int def_nr, int index)
00634 {
00635     Mesh *me = ob->data;
00636     BMEditMesh *em = me->edit_btmesh;
00637     BMVert *eve_mirr;
00638 
00639     eve_mirr = editbmesh_get_x_mirror_vert(ob, em, eve, eve->co, index);
00640 
00641     if (eve_mirr && eve_mirr != eve) {
00642         MDeformVert *dvert_src = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->vdata, eve->head.data, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
00643         MDeformVert *dvert_dst = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->vdata, eve_mirr->head.data, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
00644         if (dvert_dst) {
00645             if (def_nr == -1) {
00646                 /* all vgroups, add groups where neded  */
00647                 int flip_map_len;
00648                 int *flip_map = defgroup_flip_map(ob, &flip_map_len, TRUE);
00649                 defvert_sync_mapped(dvert_dst, dvert_src, flip_map, flip_map_len, TRUE);
00650                 MEM_freeN(flip_map);
00651             }
00652             else {
00653                 /* single vgroup */
00654                 MDeformWeight *dw = defvert_verify_index(dvert_dst, defgroup_flip_index(ob, def_nr, 1));
00655                 if (dw) {
00656                     dw->weight = defvert_find_weight(dvert_src, def_nr);
00657                 }
00658             }
00659         }
00660     }
00661 }
00662 
00663 static void vgroup_adjust_active(Object *ob, int def_nr)
00664 {
00665     BMVert *eve_act;
00666     MDeformVert *dvert_act;
00667 
00668     act_vert_def(ob, &eve_act, &dvert_act);
00669 
00670     if (dvert_act) {
00671         if (((Mesh *)ob->data)->editflag & ME_EDIT_MIRROR_X)
00672             editvert_mirror_update(ob, eve_act, def_nr, -1);
00673     }
00674 }
00675 
00676 static void vgroup_copy_active_to_sel(Object *ob)
00677 {
00678     BMVert *eve_act;
00679     MDeformVert *dvert_act;
00680 
00681     act_vert_def(ob, &eve_act, &dvert_act);
00682 
00683     if (dvert_act == NULL) {
00684         return;
00685     }
00686     else {
00687         Mesh *me = ob->data;
00688         BMEditMesh *em = me->edit_btmesh;
00689         BMIter iter;
00690         BMVert *eve;
00691         MDeformVert *dvert;
00692         int index = 0;
00693 
00694         BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00695             if (BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT) && eve != eve_act) {
00696                 dvert = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->vdata, eve->head.data, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
00697                 if (dvert) {
00698                     defvert_copy(dvert, dvert_act);
00699 
00700                     if (me->editflag & ME_EDIT_MIRROR_X)
00701                         editvert_mirror_update(ob, eve, -1, index);
00702 
00703                 }
00704             }
00705 
00706             index++;
00707         }
00708     }
00709 }
00710 
00711 static void vgroup_copy_active_to_sel_single(Object *ob, const int def_nr)
00712 {
00713     BMVert *eve_act;
00714     MDeformVert *dv_act;
00715 
00716     act_vert_def(ob, &eve_act, &dv_act);
00717 
00718     if (dv_act == NULL) {
00719         return;
00720     }
00721     else {
00722         Mesh *me = ob->data;
00723         BMEditMesh *em = me->edit_btmesh;
00724         BMIter iter;
00725         BMVert *eve;
00726         MDeformVert *dv;
00727         MDeformWeight *dw;
00728         float weight_act;
00729         int index = 0;
00730 
00731         dw = defvert_find_index(dv_act, def_nr);
00732 
00733         if (dw == NULL)
00734             return;
00735 
00736         weight_act = dw->weight;
00737 
00738         eve = BM_iter_new(&iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, NULL);
00739         for (index = 0; eve; eve = BM_iter_step(&iter), index++) {
00740             if (BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT) && eve != eve_act) {
00741                 dv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->vdata, eve->head.data, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
00742                 dw = defvert_find_index(dv, def_nr);
00743                 if (dw) {
00744                     dw->weight = weight_act;
00745 
00746                     if (me->editflag & ME_EDIT_MIRROR_X) {
00747                         editvert_mirror_update(ob, eve, -1, index);
00748                     }
00749                 }
00750             }
00751         }
00752 
00753         if (me->editflag & ME_EDIT_MIRROR_X) {
00754             editvert_mirror_update(ob, eve_act, -1, -1);
00755         }
00756     }
00757 }
00758 
00759 static void vgroup_normalize_active(Object *ob)
00760 {
00761     BMVert *eve_act;
00762     MDeformVert *dvert_act;
00763 
00764     act_vert_def(ob, &eve_act, &dvert_act);
00765 
00766     if (dvert_act == NULL)
00767         return;
00768 
00769     defvert_normalize(dvert_act);
00770 
00771     if (((Mesh *)ob->data)->editflag & ME_EDIT_MIRROR_X)
00772         editvert_mirror_update(ob, eve_act, -1, -1);
00773 }
00774 
00775 static void do_view3d_vgroup_buttons(bContext *C, void *UNUSED(arg), int event)
00776 {
00777     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00778     Object *ob = OBACT;
00779 
00780     /* XXX TODO Use operators? */
00781     if (event == B_VGRP_PNL_NORMALIZE) {
00782         vgroup_normalize_active(ob);
00783     }
00784     else if (event == B_VGRP_PNL_COPY) {
00785         vgroup_copy_active_to_sel(ob);
00786     }
00787     else if (event >= B_VGRP_PNL_COPY_SINGLE) {
00788         vgroup_copy_active_to_sel_single(ob, event - B_VGRP_PNL_COPY_SINGLE);
00789     }
00790     else if (event >= B_VGRP_PNL_EDIT_SINGLE) {
00791         vgroup_adjust_active(ob, event - B_VGRP_PNL_EDIT_SINGLE);
00792     }
00793 
00794 #if 0 /* TODO */
00795     if (((Mesh *)ob->data)->editflag & ME_EDIT_MIRROR_X)
00796         ED_vgroup_mirror(ob, 1, 1, 0);
00797 #endif
00798 
00799     /* default for now */
00800     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00801     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_DATA, ob->data);
00802 }
00803 
00804 static int view3d_panel_vgroup_poll(const bContext *C, PanelType *UNUSED(pt))
00805 {
00806     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00807     Object *ob = OBACT;
00808     BMVert *eve_act;
00809     MDeformVert *dvert_act;
00810 
00811     act_vert_def(ob, &eve_act, &dvert_act);
00812 
00813     return dvert_act ? dvert_act->totweight : 0;
00814 }
00815 
00816 
00817 static void view3d_panel_vgroup(const bContext *C, Panel *pa)
00818 {
00819     uiBlock *block = uiLayoutAbsoluteBlock(pa->layout);
00820     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00821     Object *ob = OBACT;
00822 
00823     BMVert *eve;
00824     MDeformVert *dv;
00825 
00826     act_vert_def(ob, &eve, &dv);
00827 
00828     if (dv && dv->totweight) {
00829         uiLayout *col;
00830         bDeformGroup *dg;
00831         MDeformWeight *dw = dv->dw;
00832         unsigned int i;
00833         int yco = 0;
00834 
00835         uiBlockSetHandleFunc(block, do_view3d_vgroup_buttons, NULL);
00836 
00837         col = uiLayoutColumn(pa->layout, 0);
00838         block = uiLayoutAbsoluteBlock(col);
00839 
00840         uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
00841 
00842         for (i = dv->totweight; i != 0; i--, dw++) {
00843             dg = BLI_findlink(&ob->defbase, dw->def_nr);
00844             if (dg) {
00845                 uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_VGRP_PNL_EDIT_SINGLE + dw->def_nr, dg->name, 0, yco, 180, 20,
00846                           &dw->weight, 0.0, 1.0, 1, 3, "");
00847                 uiDefBut(block, BUT, B_VGRP_PNL_COPY_SINGLE + dw->def_nr, "C", 180, yco, 20, 20,
00848                          NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, TIP_("Copy this group's weight to other selected verts"));
00849                 yco -= 20;
00850             }
00851         }
00852         yco -= 2;
00853 
00854         uiBlockEndAlign(block);
00855         uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
00856         uiDefBut(block, BUT, B_VGRP_PNL_NORMALIZE, IFACE_("Normalize"), 0, yco, 100, 20,
00857                  NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, TIP_("Normalize active vertex weights"));
00858         uiDefBut(block, BUT, B_VGRP_PNL_COPY, IFACE_("Copy"), 100, yco, 100, 20,
00859                  NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, TIP_("Copy active vertex to other seleted verts"));
00860         uiBlockEndAlign(block);
00861     }
00862 }
00863 
00864 static void v3d_transform_butsR(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr)
00865 {
00866     uiLayout *split, *colsub;
00867 
00868     split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.8, 0);
00869 
00870     if (ptr->type == &RNA_PoseBone) {
00871         PointerRNA boneptr;
00872         Bone *bone;
00873 
00874         boneptr = RNA_pointer_get(ptr, "bone");
00875         bone = boneptr.data;
00876         uiLayoutSetActive(split, !(bone->parent && bone->flag & BONE_CONNECTED));
00877     }
00878     colsub = uiLayoutColumn(split, 1);
00879     uiItemR(colsub, ptr, "location", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00880     colsub = uiLayoutColumn(split, 1);
00881     uiItemL(colsub, "", ICON_NONE);
00882     uiItemR(colsub, ptr, "lock_location", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE | UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY, "", ICON_NONE);
00883 
00884     split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.8, 0);
00885 
00886     switch (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "rotation_mode")) {
00887         case ROT_MODE_QUAT: /* quaternion */
00888             colsub = uiLayoutColumn(split, 1);
00889             uiItemR(colsub, ptr, "rotation_quaternion", 0, IFACE_("Rotation"), ICON_NONE);
00890             colsub = uiLayoutColumn(split, 1);
00891             uiItemR(colsub, ptr, "lock_rotations_4d", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, IFACE_("4L"), ICON_NONE);
00892             if (RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "lock_rotations_4d"))
00893                 uiItemR(colsub, ptr, "lock_rotation_w", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE + UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY, "", ICON_NONE);
00894             else
00895                 uiItemL(colsub, "", ICON_NONE);
00896             uiItemR(colsub, ptr, "lock_rotation", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE | UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY, "", ICON_NONE);
00897             break;
00898         case ROT_MODE_AXISANGLE: /* axis angle */
00899             colsub = uiLayoutColumn(split, 1);
00900             uiItemR(colsub, ptr, "rotation_axis_angle", 0, IFACE_("Rotation"), ICON_NONE);
00901             colsub = uiLayoutColumn(split, 1);
00902             uiItemR(colsub, ptr, "lock_rotations_4d", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, IFACE_("4L"), ICON_NONE);
00903             if (RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "lock_rotations_4d"))
00904                 uiItemR(colsub, ptr, "lock_rotation_w", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE | UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY, "", ICON_NONE);
00905             else
00906                 uiItemL(colsub, "", ICON_NONE);
00907             uiItemR(colsub, ptr, "lock_rotation", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE | UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY, "", ICON_NONE);
00908             break;
00909         default: /* euler rotations */
00910             colsub = uiLayoutColumn(split, 1);
00911             uiItemR(colsub, ptr, "rotation_euler", 0, IFACE_("Rotation"), ICON_NONE);
00912             colsub = uiLayoutColumn(split, 1);
00913             uiItemL(colsub, "", ICON_NONE);
00914             uiItemR(colsub, ptr, "lock_rotation", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE | UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY, "", ICON_NONE);
00915             break;
00916     }
00917     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "rotation_mode", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
00918 
00919     split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.8, 0);
00920     colsub = uiLayoutColumn(split, 1);
00921     uiItemR(colsub, ptr, "scale", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00922     colsub = uiLayoutColumn(split, 1);
00923     uiItemL(colsub, "", ICON_NONE);
00924     uiItemR(colsub, ptr, "lock_scale", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE | UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY, "", ICON_NONE);
00925 
00926     if (ptr->type == &RNA_Object) {
00927         Object *ob = ptr->data;
00928         /* dimensions and material support just happen to be the same checks
00929          * later we may want to add dimensions for lattice, armature etc too */
00930         if (OB_TYPE_SUPPORT_MATERIAL(ob->type)) {
00931             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "dimensions", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00932         }
00933     }
00934 }
00935 
00936 static void v3d_posearmature_buts(uiLayout *layout, Object *ob)
00937 {
00938     bPoseChannel *pchan;
00939     PointerRNA pchanptr;
00940     uiLayout *col;
00941 
00942     pchan = get_active_posechannel(ob);
00943 
00944     if (!pchan) {
00945         uiItemL(layout, IFACE_("No Bone Active"), ICON_NONE);
00946         return;
00947     }
00948 
00949     RNA_pointer_create(&ob->id, &RNA_PoseBone, pchan, &pchanptr);
00950 
00951     col = uiLayoutColumn(layout, 0);
00952 
00953     /* XXX: RNA buts show data in native types (i.e. quats, 4-component axis/angle, etc.)
00954      * but old-school UI shows in eulers always. Do we want to be able to still display in Eulers?
00955      * Maybe needs RNA/ui options to display rotations as different types... */
00956     v3d_transform_butsR(col, &pchanptr);
00957 }
00958 
00959 static void v3d_editarmature_buts(uiLayout *layout, Object *ob)
00960 {
00961     bArmature *arm = ob->data;
00962     EditBone *ebone;
00963     uiLayout *col;
00964     PointerRNA eboneptr;
00965 
00966     ebone = arm->act_edbone;
00967 
00968     if (!ebone || (ebone->layer & arm->layer) == 0) {
00969         uiItemL(layout, IFACE_("Nothing selected"), ICON_NONE);
00970         return;
00971     }
00972 
00973     RNA_pointer_create(&arm->id, &RNA_EditBone, ebone, &eboneptr);
00974 
00975     col = uiLayoutColumn(layout, 0);
00976     uiItemR(col, &eboneptr, "head", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00977     if (ebone->parent && ebone->flag & BONE_CONNECTED) {
00978         PointerRNA parptr = RNA_pointer_get(&eboneptr, "parent");
00979         uiItemR(col, &parptr, "tail_radius", 0, IFACE_("Radius (Parent)"), ICON_NONE);
00980     }
00981     else {
00982         uiItemR(col, &eboneptr, "head_radius", 0, IFACE_("Radius"), ICON_NONE);
00983     }
00984 
00985     uiItemR(col, &eboneptr, "tail", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00986     uiItemR(col, &eboneptr, "tail_radius", 0, IFACE_("Radius"), ICON_NONE);
00987 
00988     uiItemR(col, &eboneptr, "roll", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00989     uiItemR(col, &eboneptr, "envelope_distance", 0, IFACE_("Envelope"), ICON_NONE);
00990 }
00991 
00992 static void v3d_editmetaball_buts(uiLayout *layout, Object *ob)
00993 {
00994     PointerRNA mbptr, ptr;
00995     MetaBall *mball = ob->data;
00996     uiLayout *col;
00997 
00998     if (!mball || !(mball->lastelem))
00999         return;
01000 
01001     RNA_pointer_create(&mball->id, &RNA_MetaBall, mball, &mbptr);
01002 
01003     RNA_pointer_create(&mball->id, &RNA_MetaElement, mball->lastelem, &ptr);
01004 
01005     col = uiLayoutColumn(layout, 0);
01006     uiItemR(col, &ptr, "co", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01007 
01008     uiItemR(col, &ptr, "radius", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01009     uiItemR(col, &ptr, "stiffness", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01010 
01011     uiItemR(col, &ptr, "type", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
01012 
01013     col = uiLayoutColumn(layout, 1);
01014     switch (RNA_enum_get(&ptr, "type")) {
01015         case MB_BALL:
01016             break;
01017         case MB_CUBE:
01018             uiItemL(col, IFACE_("Size:"), ICON_NONE);
01019             uiItemR(col, &ptr, "size_x", 0, "X", ICON_NONE);
01020             uiItemR(col, &ptr, "size_y", 0, "Y", ICON_NONE);
01021             uiItemR(col, &ptr, "size_z", 0, "Z", ICON_NONE);
01022             break;
01023         case MB_TUBE:
01024             uiItemL(col, IFACE_("Size:"), ICON_NONE);
01025             uiItemR(col, &ptr, "size_x", 0, "X", ICON_NONE);
01026             break;
01027         case MB_PLANE:
01028             uiItemL(col, IFACE_("Size:"), ICON_NONE);
01029             uiItemR(col, &ptr, "size_x", 0, "X", ICON_NONE);
01030             uiItemR(col, &ptr, "size_y", 0, "Y", ICON_NONE);
01031             break;
01032         case MB_ELIPSOID:
01033             uiItemL(col, IFACE_("Size:"), ICON_NONE);
01034             uiItemR(col, &ptr, "size_x", 0, "X", ICON_NONE);
01035             uiItemR(col, &ptr, "size_y", 0, "Y", ICON_NONE);
01036             uiItemR(col, &ptr, "size_z", 0, "Z", ICON_NONE);
01037             break;
01038     }
01039 }
01040 
01041 static void do_view3d_region_buttons(bContext *C, void *UNUSED(index), int event)
01042 {
01043     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
01044     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
01045     Object *ob = OBACT;
01046 
01047     switch (event) {
01048 
01049         case B_REDR:
01050             ED_area_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_area(C));
01051             return; /* no notifier! */
01052 
01053         case B_OBJECTPANELMEDIAN:
01054             if (ob) {
01055                 v3d_editvertex_buts(NULL, v3d, ob, 1.0);
01056                 DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
01057             }
01058             break;
01059     }
01060 
01061     /* default for now */
01062     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SPACE | ND_SPACE_VIEW3D, v3d);
01063 }
01064 
01065 static void view3d_panel_object(const bContext *C, Panel *pa)
01066 {
01067     uiBlock *block;
01068     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
01069     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
01070     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
01071     Object *ob = OBACT;
01072     PointerRNA obptr;
01073     uiLayout *col;
01074     float lim;
01075 
01076     if (ob == NULL)
01077         return;
01078 
01079     lim = 10000.0f * MAX2(1.0f, v3d->grid);
01080 
01081     block = uiLayoutGetBlock(pa->layout);
01082     uiBlockSetHandleFunc(block, do_view3d_region_buttons, NULL);
01083 
01084     col = uiLayoutColumn(pa->layout, 0);
01085     /* row = uiLayoutRow(col, 0); */ /* UNUSED */
01086     RNA_id_pointer_create(&ob->id, &obptr);
01087 
01088     if (ob == obedit) {
01089         if (ob->type == OB_ARMATURE)
01090             v3d_editarmature_buts(col, ob);
01091         else if (ob->type == OB_MBALL)
01092             v3d_editmetaball_buts(col, ob);
01093         else
01094             v3d_editvertex_buts(col, v3d, ob, lim);
01095     }
01096     else if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE) {
01097         v3d_posearmature_buts(col, ob);
01098     }
01099     else {
01100         v3d_transform_butsR(col, &obptr);
01101     }
01102 }
01103 
01104 void view3d_buttons_register(ARegionType *art)
01105 {
01106     PanelType *pt;
01107 
01108     pt = MEM_callocN(sizeof(PanelType), "spacetype view3d panel object");
01109     strcpy(pt->idname, "VIEW3D_PT_object");
01110     strcpy(pt->label, "Transform");
01111     pt->draw = view3d_panel_object;
01112     BLI_addtail(&art->paneltypes, pt);
01113 
01114     pt = MEM_callocN(sizeof(PanelType), "spacetype view3d panel gpencil");
01115     strcpy(pt->idname, "VIEW3D_PT_gpencil");
01116     strcpy(pt->label, "Grease Pencil");
01117     pt->draw = gpencil_panel_standard;
01118     BLI_addtail(&art->paneltypes, pt);
01119 
01120     pt = MEM_callocN(sizeof(PanelType), "spacetype view3d panel vgroup");
01121     strcpy(pt->idname, "VIEW3D_PT_vgroup");
01122     strcpy(pt->label, "Vertex Groups");
01123     pt->draw = view3d_panel_vgroup;
01124     pt->poll = view3d_panel_vgroup_poll;
01125     BLI_addtail(&art->paneltypes, pt);
01126 }
01127 
01128 static int view3d_properties(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
01129 {
01130     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
01131     ARegion *ar = view3d_has_buttons_region(sa);
01132 
01133     if (ar)
01134         ED_region_toggle_hidden(C, ar);
01135 
01136     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01137 }
01138 
01139 void VIEW3D_OT_properties(wmOperatorType *ot)
01140 {
01141     ot->name = "Properties";
01142     ot->description = "Toggles the properties panel display";
01143     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_properties";
01144 
01145     ot->exec = view3d_properties;
01146     ot->poll = ED_operator_view3d_active;
01147 
01148     /* flags */
01149     ot->flag = 0;
01150 }
